creator: Kostecki@his.de
text:
Hello!
I am getting here some strange behavior using FOP 0.93. (Also tried 0.94, 0.95)
I would like to create XSL->PDF documents with enabled security.

-> http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.94/pdfencryption.html

So, I am creating documents -noprint, -nocopy and -noedit. When I do so, there are now problems with older clients.

Adobe Reader 5.0 for example asks a password. But there is none set. There are also problems on mac-computer, where it asks for a password.

Without using the security, no password is getting asked. Is this a bug? What could i do wrong here?

Redards,
Conrad Kostecki

creator: Kostecki@his.de
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 40557 ***
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
